headline: Is GE HealthCare Technologies (GEHC) Offering Value After Its Spin Off From General Electric?
summary: If you are wondering whether GE HealthCare Technologies is offering good value today, you are not alone. The stock often draws interest from investors who care about what they are paying for future potential. The share price recently closed at US$83.86, with returns of 4.4% over the past week, 5.1% over the past month, 1.3% year to date, and a 7.2% decline over the past year. headline: 1 Healthcare Stock to Consider Right Now and 2 We Turn Down
summary: From novel pharmaceuticals to telemedicine, most healthcare companies are on a mission to drive better patient outcomes. Those leading the charge have not only realized strong financial performance but also propelled the broader industry’s returns as healthcare stocks have gained 10.6% over the past six months while the S&P 500 was up 7.3%.

headline: Kratos Deepens Role In Unmanned, Hypersonic And Missile Programs With New Deals
summary: Kratos Defense & Security Solutions (NasdaqGS:KTOS) and GE Aerospace won a U.S. Air Force contract to design the next generation GEK1500 engine for small Collaborative Combat Aircraft. Kratos secured a Pentagon award related to hypersonic materials testing, focused on thermal protection systems. The company is participating in the Pentagon’s Drone Dominance Program Phase 1 Gauntlet. Through its Prometheus Energetics joint venture, Kratos is advancing a solid rocket motor manufacturing...
